unit: Unit 8 | Inference for Categorical Data: Chi-Square
title: Musical Instruments: Best Statistical Test
question_text: Piano Guitar Violin Flute None Private School 20 9 7 12 2 Public School 8 30 1 8 3 The data summarized in the two-way chart above reflect the results of asking $50$ students in a public school and $50$ students in a private school what musical instrument they had learned to play. In cases where students had learned to play more than one instrument, they were instructed to choose the instrument they had played for the longest amount of time. A school counselor wants to see if there is a relationship between the type of school and the type of instrument played. What would be the best statistical test for the counselor to use?

choices.text: Chi-square test for goodness of fit.
